00001 from node import *

00006 class BackPropNetwork:
00007     def __init__(self, input, hidden, output, seed=0):
00008         self.nodes = {}
00009         self.id = -1
00010         self.index = 0
00011         self.doprop = False
00012         self.layers = [[], [], []]
00013         self.inputs = []
00014         self.outputs = []
00015         self.tnode = Node("threshold", self.doprop)
00016         self.tnode.outval = 1.0
00017         self.oldw = {}
00018 
00019         self.rand = random.Random()
00020         self.rand.seed(seed)
00021         for i in xrange(input):
00022             self.addToInputLayer()
00023         for i in xrange(hidden):
00024             self.addToHiddenLayer(self.rand.uniform(-1.0, 1.0))
00025         for i in xrange(output):
00026             self.addToOutputLayer(self.rand.uniform(-1.0, 1.0))
00027 
00028     def addToInputLayer(self):
00029         newnode = self.addNode(0, squash=0)
00030         conn = Connection(self, newnode, 1.0, self.doprop)
00031         self.inputs.append(conn)
00032         newnode.inputs.append(conn)
00033 
00034     def addToOutputLayer(self, threshold):
00035         newnode = self.addNode(2)
00036         conn = Connection(newnode, self, 1.0, self.doprop)
00037         self.outputs.append(conn)
00038         newnode.outputs.append(conn)
00039 
00040     def addToHiddenLayer(self, threshold):
00041         newnode = self.addNode(1, threshold)
00042 
00043     def addNode(self, layer, threshold=None, squash=True):
00044         id = (layer, len(self.layers[layer]))
00045         newnode = Node(id, self.doprop, squash=squash)
00046         self.layers[layer].append(newnode)
00047         if threshold:
00048             self.addThreshold(newnode, threshold)
00049         if layer != 0:
00050             for n in self.layers[layer-1]:
00051                 self.addConnection(n, newnode, self.rand.uniform(-1.0, 1.0))
00052         if layer != 2:
00053             for n in self.layers[layer+1]:
00054                 self.addConnection(newnode, n, self.rand.uniform(-1.0, 1.0))
00055         return newnode
00056 
00057     def addConnection(self, src, dest, weight=1.0):
00058         conn = Connection(src, dest, weight, self.doprop)
00059         src.outputs.append(conn)
00060         dest.inputs.append(conn)
00061 
00062     def addThreshold(self, dest, threshold):
00063         conn = Connection(self.tnode, dest, threshold)
00064         self.tnode.outputs.append(conn)
00065         dest.inputs.append(conn)
00066         dest.threshold = self.tnode
00067 
00068     def setInput(self, vals):
00069         if len(vals) != len(self.inputs):
00070             raise InputSizeError
00071 
00072         for i in xrange(len(vals)):
00073             self.inputs[i].setValue(float(vals[i]))
00074 
00075         for layer in self.layers:
00076             for node in layer:
00077                 node.onInput()
00078 
00079     def getOutput(self):
00080         vals = []
00081         for o in self.outputs:
00082             vals.append(o.getValue())
00083         return vals
00084 
00085     def test(self, pattern):
00086         right = 0
00087         wrong = 0
00088         kap = {}
00089         for p in pattern:
00090             input = p[0]
00091             self.setInput(input)
00092             output = [int(round(v)) for v in self.getOutput()]
00093             target = [int(round(v)) for v in p[1]]
00094 
00095             if target == output:
00096                 right += 1
00097             else:
00098                 wrong += 1
00099             lt = tuple(p[1])
00100             rt = tuple(output)
00101             if not kap.has_key(lt):
00102                 kap[lt] = {}
00103             if not kap[lt].has_key(rt):
00104                 kap[lt][rt] = 0
00105             kap[lt][rt] += 1
00106         return right, wrong, kap
00107 
00108     def adjustWeights(self, input, target, rate, mrate):
00109         self.setInput(input)
00110         outnodes = self.layers[2]
00111         if len(target) != len(outnodes):
00112             raise ValueError("wrong number of target values")
00113         deltas = {}
00114         #output errors
00115         for k in xrange(len(target)):
00116             error = target[k] - outnodes[k].outval
00117             deltas[outnodes[k]] = dfunc(outnodes[k].outval) * error
00118         
00119         for node in self.layers[1]:
00120             error = 0.0
00121             for conn in node.outputs:
00122                 error += deltas[conn.dest] * conn.weight
00123             deltas[node] = dfunc(node.outval) * error
00124 
00125         for conn in self.tnode.outputs:
00126             change = deltas[conn.dest] * conn.weight * rate
00127             conn.weight += change + self.oldw.get(conn, 0.0) * mrate
00128             self.oldw[conn] = change
00129             conn.output = conn.weight
00130 
00131         #find weight changes
00132         for layer in self.layers:
00133             for node in layer:
00134                 for conn in node.outputs:
00135                     if conn.dest.id != -1 and conn.src.id != -1:
00136                         change = deltas[conn.dest] * conn.input * rate
00137                         conn.weight += change + self.oldw.get(conn, 0.0) * mrate
00138                         self.oldw[conn] = change
00139         
00140         #find error
00141         error = 0.0
00142         for k in xrange(len(target)):
00143             error += 1.0/len(target) * (target[k] - outnodes[k].outval)**2.0
00144         return error ** 0.5
00145 
00146     def train(self, patterns, iter, rate, mrate=0.0, fi=None):
00147         for i in xrange(iter):
00148             error = 0.0
00149             for p in patterns:
00150                 input = p[0]
00151                 target = p[1]
00152                 error += self.adjustWeights(input, target, rate, mrate)
00153             if fi:
00154                 print >> fi, i, error
00155             else:
00156                 print i, error

00158 class InputSizeError(Exception):
00159     def __init__(self):
00160         print "Input size doesn't match number of network inputs"

00162 class OutputSizeError(Exception):
